short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shuffle the list of participants in a Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Google Meet Shuffle Participants extension is a productivity tool that helps you shake up your virtual meetings and promote participation among all participants. With just one click, you can shuffle the order of the participant list in your Google Meet call, giving everyone an equal chance to speak up and contribute to the conversation.

This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to create a more inclusive and collaborative virtual meeting environment, whether it's for team meetings, classroom discussions, or social gatherings. It's easy to use and doesn't require any special skills or training.

With the Google Meet Shuffle Participants extension, you can:

- Randomize the order of the participant list with one click
- Encourage more active participation and engagement among all participants
- Create a fair and inclusive meeting environment
- Boost productivity and creativity in your meetings
- Try the Google Meet Shuffle Participants extension today and see how it can transform your virtual meetings!
